goal.en: This course aims to train graduate students to read academic papers and establish their capacity for independent research.
goal.ch: 本課程旨在培養研究生閱讀學術論文並建立獨立研究的能力。

content.en: This course will mainly cover the latest developments in mathematical image processing and data science.
content.ch: 本課程將主要涵蓋數學影像處理和資料科學領域的最新進展。

textbook.en: (1) G. Aubert and P. Kornprobst, Mathematical Problems in Image Processing: Partial Differential Equations and the Calculus of Variations, Second Edition, Springer, New York, 2006. (2) D. Calvetti and E. Somersalo, Mathematics of Data Science, SIAM, 2021. (3) M. Elad, Sparse and Redundant Representations: from Theory to Applications in Signal and Image Processing, Springer, New York, 2010.
textbook.ch: (1) G. Aubert and P. Kornprobst, Mathematical Problems in Image Processing: Partial Differential Equations and the Calculus of Variations, Second Edition, Springer, New York, 2006. (2) D. Calvetti and E. Somersalo, Mathematics of Data Science, SIAM, 2021. (3) M. Elad, Sparse and Redundant Representations: from Theory to Applications in Signal and Image Processing, Springer, New York, 2010.

flex_desc.en: Individual discussions are scheduled for weeks 17-18.
flex_desc.ch: Individual discussions are scheduled for weeks 17-18.
